911290.name: Prehistoria
911290.description:
In this exciting virtual reality experience, you will come face to face with dinosaurs and other prehistoric animals. Across 6 different beautifully crafted environments you will get to observe and learn about many fascinating creatures that once roamed our planet. You can watch them from a safe distance or, if you are of the more adventurous sort, get close up and see them eye to eye. Be careful, however, not all beasts will appreciate their personal space being invaded..

Please use HEADPHONES for a fully immersive experience!
911290.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
